CustomField.description: Determines the maximum 'soft' stack depth in the async framework. After this limit is reached it will start to take instructions from the async worker's getMaxDepthAction method. NOTE: This should be a small number ranging from 3-6 usually.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the maximum 'soft' stack depth in the async framework. After this limit is reached it will start to take instructions from the async worker's getMaxDepthAction method. NOTE: This should be a small number ranging from 3-6 usually.
CustomField.label: Async Framework Max Stack Depth
